alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:18AM MST until March 05 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting 25 to 40 MPH, highest in the Upper Snake Plain. * WHERE...The Beaverhead Lemhi Highlands, Snake Plain, Blackfoot Mountains, and Bear Lake area, including but not limited to Monida Pass, Dubois, St. Anthony, Rexburg, Rigby, Idaho Falls, Ammon, Shelley, Blackfoot, Fort Hall, Aberdeen, American Falls, Pocatello, Chubbuck, Soda Springs, Georgetown, Montpelier, St. Charles, Geneva Summit, and Border Summit. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Although active snowfall will be ending for most areas this morning, winds will be increasing. Be prepared for continued slick roads and pockets of blowing and drifting snow across highways.
info.instruction: If you will be driving, slow down, use extra caution, and plan extra time to reach your destination. The latest highway conditions are available at 511.idaho.gov, the Idaho 511 App, or by calling 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
